txt.en: 'The people of Eaworth will remember your kindness, [placeholder]. Thank you!'
'Offram sent you with this pie? Thank you... it will go far to feed my family.'
'This pie is an adequate compensation for the use of my oven.'
'We thank you for this gift, [placeholder]... you are a friend to the people of Eaworth.'
Sacks of flour and vegetables can be found within the Eaworth Vendor Hall.\n\nOffram wants you to collect sacks of flour and vegetables to finish making meat-pies for the inhabitants of Eaworth.

Ordbéorth's oven can be found behind his house in the northern part of Eaworth.\n\nOffram wants you to take the meat, flour, and vegetables to Ordbéorth's oven and bake meat-pies for the inhabitants of Eaworth.
'Offram knows the needs of my family. Thank you for this gift of food.'
People in need of provisions can be found throughout Eaworth.\n\nOffram wants you to take the meat-pies you baked to people in need of provisions for the siege.
Offram stands guard outside the Vendor Hall in Eaworth.\n\nYou should return to Offram and let him know that you have delivered the meat-pies.
Take meat, flour, and vegetables to Ordbéorth's oven and bake meat-pies
Talk to Offram outside the Vendor Hall in Eaworth
'Dark times come, and this pie shall be a blessing in amid the storm. Thank you.'
Pleased with your hunting prowess and offering of aurochs-meat, hides, and ivory, Offram has recruited you to perform more tasks.

'[placeholder], please take the meat you brought me and make some meat-pies for the people of Eaworth. You will need other ingredients, as well.

'You will find sacks of flour and vegetables in the Vendor Hall. Take the ingredients to the oven behind Ordbéorth's house in the northern part of the city.

'When you have finished baking the pies, bring them to the people in need of them, then return to me.'
